    HierFabs: installation

    Xiao Zhang

    2022-10-21

    HierFabs.Rmd

    Install the HierFabs

    This vignette provides an introduction to the R package HierFabs, where the function HierFabs implements our model. With the completely newly developed forward and backward steps to accommodate hierarchy, HierFabs is able to detect important main effects and interactions under both the strong and weak hierarchy. Advancing from the existing studies, HierFabs accommodates multiple types of interaction models with differentiable loss functions under a unified framework. The package can be installed with the following command from Github:

    install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github("XiaoZhangryy/HierFabs")

    The package can be loaded with the command:

    library("HierFabs")
